name: Bloody Sheepfold
description:
How to play

Directional arrows - Moving
X - Scare sheep
C - Attract sheep
V - Help ship stuck in hole

Created for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam with the theme "unstable"

You are an old grumpy shepherd that takes good care of her sheeps, at least during the day. But you are also cursed, and transform into a werewolf at night.

The good news is that you can predict what movement you will do once the sun is set, which leaves you time during the day to organize your sheeps in order to protect them from your blood-thirst.
